journal.validation: The journal page title is required to be a non-empty string.

clientenabled.name: Enable TinyMCE Everywhere! (client):
clientenabled.hint: Provides a client setting to enable / disable TinyMCE Everywhere! for the current user.

location.name: Editor location:
location.hint: Sets the location where TinyMCE Everywhere is the default / only editor available. For instance setting 'All' will make all text editors TinyMCE.

journalenabled.name: Enable for journal editing:
journalenabled.hint: Provides a world setting to enable / disable 'TinyMCE Everywhere!' in journal page editing. When enabled all text page sheets use TinyMCE.

cursor.name: Initial cursor location:
cursor.hint: Defines the placement of the cursor on editor initialization.

help.name: Add toolbar help button:
help.hint: Enables a help button in the editor toolbar for users unfamiliar w/ TinyMCE.

toolbar.name: Toolbar type:
toolbar.hint: Defines the options available in the toolbar. 'Dynamic' will select either 'Basic' or 'Extended' depending on space available. 'Default' is the base Foundry configuration.
